Package com.cyberfront.crdt.sample.manager

Class JsonManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cyberfront.crdt.CRDTManager
      • com.cyberfront.crdt.sample.manager.JsonManager

  • public class JsonManager
extends CRDTManager
    The Class JsonManager provides a simple mechanism for managing raw JSON content as a CRDT. It supports the basic CRUD operations on JSON objects. The create operation results in an empty JSON object, and instantiation of any JSON properties are handled exclusively as updates.

    • Field Summary
